thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 19 of 1307
thread.title: Jaimie H
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Jaimie H

author: Jaimie H
title: Jaimie H
text: Needed a tire desperately and turns out needed an alignment just as bad. They got me in and out in under an hour. I was also explained the benefits of buying the warranty. This made me want to buy it rather than just asking if I wanted it without knowing the perks. Great job guys! Will return for more business.
